Edges-Duelist -- Female Human Heroic Duelist
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Soldier: +1 Strength Step (encumbrance)/May reroll Vigor (environmental hazards)
Anemic: -2 Vigor (resist disease, sickness, fatigue, and environment)
Brave: +2 Spirit vs. fear, -2 fear table roll
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d12 Repair: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common
Skill Notes:
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Charismatic: May reroll Persuasion
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/May attempt Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Cayden Cailean (Good)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 14; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (9 points): Brave; Charismatic; Danger Sense; Duelist II; Duelist III; Duelist; Fighter; Iron Jaw; Soldier Hindrances: Anemic; Can't Swim; Vengeful; Vow Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Duelist II: Has Crippling Strike feature
Duelist III: Has Deflect Arrows feature
Duelist: Has Surgical Strike and Parry features
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Vengeful: Seeks revenge legally
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 8 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: None Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (2d8 R15" AP 2); Knife (d6+d4 R3"); Sling (d6+d4 R4"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +6 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Crippling Strike: Successful attack reduces foe Pace by 2 until healed
Deflect Arrows: Foes suffer -2 ranged attacks
Iron Jaw: +2 Soak rolls/+2 Vigor vs. knockout
Martial Flexibility: May gain benefits of combat edge for 5 rd 1/encounter
Parry: Defend maneuver gives +6 Parry
Surgical Strike: +2 damage with light weapons (MinStr <= d6)
